alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:19PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jackson and southeastern Franklin Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 218 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Skyline, or 11 miles north of Scottsboro, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bridgeport, Stevenson, Skyline, Anderson, Hytop, Bass, Jericho, Long Island, Russell Cave National Monument and Estillfork. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
